name: Aircraft Pushback Simulator
description:
Attention, Attention!!! In 30 minutes, the gates open to the Rome-Madrid flight.

Hurry up, your mission is to make sure everything is going well at the airport. In this airport sim you have to do your best to park the plane at the gate at the right time, to not create flight delays.

Do you think you will be able to park a plane without damaging it? If so, then we need you to keep the situation under control and for each traveler to reach his destination on time.

Game Features :
- Multiple levels
- Checkpoints that help with parking
- Pushback Truck
- Timer for each mission
